EmailTemplate.description: Acknowledgement email sent to homeowners upon receipt of warranty cards
EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - Home Owner Acknowledgement Email
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Warranty Acknowledgement and CSAT Survey Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c},
Congratulations on your purchase of a SunPower solar system. This email is to confirm that we have received your Warranty Registration Card and have your system information stored in our records.
Additionally, we would like to hear about your experience with SunPower Partner {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c}. If you opted in participating in our Customer Satisfaction Survey, you will be receiving a separate email containing the survey link. The information collected in this survey will help us continue to provide the highest level of customer service and make any improvements where needed. Your feedback will remain strictly confidential.
Thank you for choosing SunPower for your energy needs. If you have questions about your solar system, call {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} who installed your system; if you have any other questions for us please contact our Customer Care team directly at 1-800-SUNPOWER or go our online knowledge center at http://us.sunpowercorp.com/support
Sincerely,
SunPower Customer Care Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER
